item.title: Scrutiny Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to issues maintaining parity with the upstream container releases, we are deprecating our Scrutiny container. We recommend switching to the official Docker images.
item.content:
Due to issues maintaining parity with the upstream container releases, we are deprecating our Scrutiny container.

We recommend switching to the official Docker images.

item.title: New Container: Scrutiny
item.description: We have released a new container for Scrutiny! Scrutiny WebUI for smartd S.M.A.R.T monitoring. Scrutiny is a Hard Drive Health Dashboard & Monitoring solution, merging manufacturer provided S.M.A.R.T metrics with real-world failure rates from Backblaze.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Scrutiny!

Scrutiny WebUI for smartd S.M.A.R.T monitoring. Scrutiny is a Hard Drive Health Dashboard & Monitoring solution, merging manufacturer provided S.M.A.R.T metrics with real-world failure rates from Backblaze.
